results.name: Stature
results.description: Costs 1 if your opponent discarded a card from their hand this game.

results.name: Storm
results.description: On Reveal: Flood this location. Next turn is the last turn cards can be played here.

results.name: Strong Guy
results.description: Ongoing: If your hand is empty, +6 Power.

results.name: Sunspot
results.description: At the end of each turn, gain +1 Power for each unspent Energy.

results.name: Super-Skrull
results.description: Ongoing: Has the Ongoing effects of all enemy cards.

results.name: Swarm
results.description:
When this is discarded from your hand, add two copies that Cost 0
to your hand.

results.name: Sword Master
results.description: On Reveal: Discard a card from your hand.

results.name: Taskmaster
results.description: On Reveal: Set this card's Power equal to the Power of the last card you played.

results.name: Thanos
results.description: At the start of the game, shuffle the six Infinity Stones into your deck.

results.name: The Collector
results.description: When a card enters your hand from anywhere (except your deck), +1 Power.

results.name: The Hood
results.description: On Reveal: Add a Demon to your hand.

results.name: The Infinaut
results.description: If you played a card last turn, you can't play this.

results.name: The Thing
results.description: It's clobberin' time!

results.name: Thor
results.description: On Reveal: Shuffle Mjolnir into your deck.

results.name: Titania
results.description: After ANY card is played here, this card switches sides.

results.name: Typhoid Mary
results.description: Ongoing: Your other cards have -1 Power.

results.name: Uatu the Watcher
results.description: Once this is in your hand, you can see the unrevealed locations.

results.name: Ultron
results.description: On Reveal: Create four 1-Power Drones at each other location.

results.name: Valkyrie
results.description: On Reveal: Set ALL cards at this location to 3 Power.

results.name: Venom
results.description: On Reveal: Destroy your other cards at this location. Add their Power to this card.

results.name: Viper
results.description: On Reveal: Your opponent gains control of one of your other cards at this location.

results.name: Vision
results.description: You can move this each turn.

results.name: Vulture
results.description:
When this card moves,
+5 Power.

results.name: Warpath
results.description: Ongoing: If any of your locations are empty, +4 Power.
